title: Your Shop issue
body:
Riot you guys sure u dont want to scam me? because this is actually a big problem
#riotgames

replies.body: You don't own Varus. The skin + champ would total 2230 RP (1350+880). 1561 is a 30% discount off both as a bundle.
Now I just feel retarded for not thinking about this.
In your defense, you're certainly not alone. I've answered several threads just like this over the past few days.
Yeah, it is a little unusual.  You wouldn't expect it.  I was under the impression that the shop was for 'champions you play', so getting skins for ones you don't own is a little out of the ordinary.

Fortunately for me, i own all champions so i never had this issue xD but yeah its a new thing. I think they suggest skins based on skin line as well...... Perhaps the OP has Dark Star Thresh, Kha'zix, or Orianna.

Hey! 

As others have pointed out, since you don't own the champion, the stop's price reflects both the price of the champion, as well as the discounted skin. I'm sorry this wasn't made super clear; it's a piece of feedback we've received, and something we'll keep in mind for next time. If you purchase the champion separately for IP, the price in the shop will drop to only the price of the skin!
Yeah this has happened to a lot of people.  Luckily, this account didn't have it and this is the one I buy skins for.
